main event: A ground sighting of a reddish, round object the size of a wash tub was reported in Muskwa, British Columbia, Canada on February 2, 1962.
interesting points: The object hovered for about 8 seconds before disappearing below the trees., The sighting was officially documented under Project Blue Book., The object was noted to have two funnels of fire., The total duration of the sighting was approximately 1 minute., A meteor was reported in the area around the same time as the sighting.
sighted object: reddish round object the size of a wash tub
